name: too-many-interacts
description: Adds many, many commands triggered by the 'write to console' field of interact components.
author: base4

tmi-disable-authorization.description: Whether to ignore authorization entirely for unrestricted interact commands.

tmi-authorized.description: A list of roles that are authorized to use unrestricted TMI interact commands. Does nothing if authorization for unrestricted interact commands is disabled.

tmi-secure-authorized.description: A list of roles that are authorized to put secure commands on bricks.

tmi-restricted-authorized.description: A list of roles that are authorized to use ALL enabled commands.

tmi-secure-commands.description: A list of interact commands that are restricted.

tmi-restricted-commands.description: A list of interact commands that are restricted.

tmi-disabled-commands.description: A list of interact commands that are disabled entirely.

tmi-disruptive-commands.description: Whether to enable disruptive commands that can be used maliciously: killall, hurtall, kick, kicklottery, ownerlottery, grantrole, removerole, broadcast.

tmi-color-roles.description: A list of roles that are considered colors, and will be swapped by the colorrole command.

commands.name: /tmi
commands.description: Too Many Interacts main command. Lists all interact types.

args.name: help
args.description: Explains how to put special interacts on bricks.
